collection.name: Piscine Mermaid
collection.openText: I will love you, forever. Please, let me have a soul...

specialTipSize.specialTip: When employees of Temperance level 3 or lower finished work, $0's Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was Good consecutively, $0's Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When $0's Qliphoth Counter reached 0, it provided Agent Joy who finished the work with a trinket promising eternal love.
After promising love, Piscine Mermaid swallowed Agent Joy, and breached Containment.
Even if the Piscine Mermaid turns back into foam, its love would remain eternal.
